title: expected trait, found derive macro `Debug` error where should be the autotrait error
body:
when defining additional some prelude traits not auto such as `Debug`
```Rust
use std::io::Read;

struct Foo {
    bar: Box<dyn Read + Debug>
}


fn main() {
    
}
```
[link](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=df173c47f7aa3280dbf65f18a389c910)
the error given by the compiler is
```
   Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground)
error[E0404]: expected trait, found derive macro `Debug`
 --> src/main.rs:4:25
  |
4 |     bar: Box<dyn Read + Debug>
  |                         ^^^^^ not a trait
help: possible better candidates are found in other modules, you can import them into scope
  |
1 | use core::fmt::Debug;
  |
1 | use futures::core_reexport::fmt::Debug;
  |
1 | use futures_core::core_reexport::fmt::Debug;
  |
1 | use futures_util::core_reexport::fmt::Debug;
  |
and 8 other candidates
```

if the code above is updated to
```Rust
use std::io::Read;

struct Foo {
    bar: Box<dyn Read + std::fmt::Debug>
}


fn main() {
    
}
```
[link](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=44aaa07844804739f1e4d585119fb4f2)

then the right error message is shown
```
Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground)
error[E0225]: only auto traits can be used as additional traits in a trait object
 --> src/main.rs:4:25
  |
4 |     bar: Box<dyn Read + std::fmt::Debug>
  |                  ----   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |                  |      |
  |                  |      additional non-auto trait
  |                  |      trait alias used in trait object type (additional use)
  |                  first non-auto trait
  |                  trait alias used in trait object type (first use)
```

thanks
